# wifi-name

> Get current wifi name


## Install

```
$ npm install --save wifi-name
```


## Usage

```js
const wifiName = require('wifi-name');

wifiName().then(name => {
	console.log(name);
	//=> 'wu-tang lan'
});
```


## Related

* [wifi-name](https://github.com/kevva/wifi-name-cli) - CLI for this module
